title: The Erasure Illusion: Stress-Testing the Generalization of LLM Forgetting Evaluation
summary: Machine unlearning aims to remove specific data influences from trained models, a capability essential for adhering to copyright laws and ensuring AI safety. Current unlearning metrics typically measure success by monitoring the model's performance degradation on the specific unlearning dataset ($D_u$).
